pages.title: Description
pages.text: Heals current spell target for 2 HP. 'Power' can also be referred to as 'potency' or 'damage'.$(br)Deals doubled damage to Undeads.

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Heals entity you're looking at for 2 HP. 'Power' can also be referred to as 'potency' or 'damage'.$(br)Deals doubled damage to Undeads.

pages.title: Heal Area
pages.text: Say:$(br)'Mana, filter allies size 5 shape area, power 2 heal!'

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Heals entities in range for 2 HP. 'Power' can also be referred to as 'potency' or 'damage'.$(br)Deals doubled damage to Undeads.$(br)Size here defines range.

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Because 'filter allies' applied before 'shape area' - It will only affect you and your allies.$(br)We do not need 'add ally' because we used 'filter allies'.

pages.title: Healing Aura
pages.text: Say:$(br)'Mana, filter allies size 5 shape area, power 2 duration 20 apply regeneration!'

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Applies minecraft:regeneration to allies, including you. 'Power' is potion power, and 'duration' is potion duration in seconds. You can apply ebwizardry:ward to protect them as well!

pages.title: Protective Aura
pages.text: Say:$(br)'Mana, filter allies size 5 shape area, power 2 duration 20 apply regeneration apply ebwizardry:ward!'

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Applies minecraft:regeneration and ebwizardry:ward to allies, including you. You can use any potion effects to buff you or allies obviously.

pages.title: Holy Area - 1
pages.text: Say:$(br)'Mana, filter undeads size 5 shape area, power 2 heal!'

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Deals doubled damage to undeads in the area. Removing filter will cause it affect any entities.

pages.title: Holy Area - 2
pages.text: Say:$(br)'Mana, add allies size 5 shape area, power 2 heal!'

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Deals damage to undeads in the area. Can heal you or your allies because of 'add allies'.

pages.title: Healing Sigil
pages.text: Say:$(br)'Mana, remove owner shape block shape sigil, power 2 heal duration 10 apply regeneration!'

pages.title: Description
pages.text: Places sigil at where you're looking. Deals damage to undeads in the area and applies regeneration effect.$(br)Can heal you and your allies because of 'remove owner'.

pages.title: Description
pages.text: 'Remove owner' can be replaced with 'add ally' to make it work for allies and you only when sneaking instead.$(br)If you want it to affect only allies, add `filter ally` instead of `add ally`.
